issues.recommendation: Ensure popups can be easily closed or do not obscure content on initial load.
Increase text contrast to improve readability for users with visual impairments.

issues.location: Navigation icons at the top right corner
issues.recommendation: Increase touch target size to comply with mobile usability standards.
Increase spacing between fund cards to improve visual hierarchy and readability.
Implement a sticky navigation bar or quick links for easier access.

issues.location: Main navigation bar at the top with small text and low contrast
issues.recommendation: Increase font size and ensure sufficient contrast between text and background for better readability.
Consider making the popup less intrusive by reducing its size or offering an easy-to-find close option.
Improve alignment and spacing between fund cards for a cleaner visual hierarchy.
Ensure all text, particularly in the footer, has sufficient contrast and larger font size for better readability.
Separate disclaimer text from other sections with appropriate spacing to enhance readability and focus.

issues.location: Top navigation bar with A+ A- icons
issues.recommendation: Ensure font resizing controls are functional and accessible to screen readers.
Increase touch target size for better accessibility on mobile devices.

issues.location: Social media icons in the footer
issues.recommendation: Add descriptive alt text for icons to improve screen reader accessibility.

issues.location: Text content on green background in the footer
issues.recommendation: Improve contrast between text and background for better readability.

issues.location: Breadcrumbs at the top of the page
issues.recommendation: Make breadcrumb links more prominent for easier navigation.
Ensure font size is large enough for comfortable reading on mobile devices.
Increase spacing between navigation items for improved readability and clickability.
Increase text contrast against the background to ensure readability for users with visual impairments.
Ensure that footer links are clearly distinguishable as clickable elements and provide more spacing.
Optimize and compress images to improve page load time and performance.
Increase the default text size to improve legibility for users with visual impairments.
Ensure elements are evenly spaced and aligned properly.
Increase button size to improve touch target accessibility.
Increase contrast for better readability.
Optimize images and scripts for faster loading.
Ensure consistent spacing between menu items for better visual balance.

issues.location: Fund cards in the main content area
issues.recommendation: Increase padding within cards to improve readability and make the design less cramped.
Increase text contrast between the button color and the text for better readability.

issues.location: Color contrast in header and footer sections
issues.recommendation: Ensure sufficient color contrast between text and background to meet WCAG standards.
Optimize images to reduce loading time and improve performance.
Add a hover effect to footer links to improve user interaction feedback.
